directions:
Combine shallot and vinegar in a bowl and let sit for 15 min to macerate.

In a separate bowl mix parsley, oil and add a generous pinch of salt.

Just before serving, add shallot (not vinegar) to the parsley oil. Stir, taste and add vinegar if needed. Taste and adjust salt.

Keep in fridge up to 3 days.

html.ingredients: 3 tbsp finely diced shallot (about 1 medium shallot) 3 tbsp red wine vinegar ¼ cup very finely chopped parsley leaves ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil salt

ingredients:
3 tbsp finely diced shallot (about 1 medium shallot)
3 tbsp red wine vinegar
¼ cup very finely chopped parsley leaves
¼ cup extra virgin olive oil 
salt
name: Basic Salsa Verde
